column1: # DESCRIPTION: Promote level 2 load data from AEMO to DataStore

column2: WITH dimService AS (SELECT DimService.ServiceId, DimService.MarketIdentifier, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DimService.MarketIdentifier ORDER BY DimService.Meta_EffectiveStartDate DESC) AS recency FROM /* Dimensional */ [schema].DimService), dimTransmissionNode AS (SELECT DimTransmissionNode.TransmissionNodeId, DimTransmissionNode.TransmissionNodeIdentity, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DimTransmissionNode.TransmissionNodeIdentity ORDER BY DimTransmissionNode.TransmissionNodeKey DESC) AS recency FROM /* Dimensional */ [schema].DimTransmissionNode)
column5: Latest views of DimService and DimTransmissionNode

column3: WHEN 'I' THEN 'Interval' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Basic' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Profile Data' WHEN '1' THEN 'Non-Market Active Import' WHEN '2' THEN 'Non-Market Active' WHEN '3' THEN 'Non-Market Reactive Import' WHEN '4' THEN 'Non-Market Reactive' END
column5: One to one mapping with substitution
One to one mapping with substitution

column3: AS VARCHAR(10)) + '.' + Level2_CSVData.NMI + '.' + CAST(Level2_CSVData.SeqNo AS VARCHAR(10))

column2: FROM /* Staging */ [schema].Level2_CSVData INNER JOIN /* Staging */ [schema].Level2_Transaction ON Level2_Transaction.transactionID = Level2_CSVData.transactionID LEFT JOIN dimService AS _dimService ON _dimService.MarketIdentifier = Level2_CSVData.NMI AND _dimService.recency = 1 LEFT JOIN dimTransmissionNode AS _dimTransmissionNode ON _dimTransmissionNode.TransmissionNodeIdentity = Level2_CSVData.TNI AND _dimTransmissionNode.recency = 1 WHERE Level2_CSVData.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID
